name: Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon
text: This card gains effects based on the number of "Harpie" monsters you control (other than "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon" and "Harpie's Brother). ● 1+ Your opponent cannot select "Harpie" monsters you control as attack targets (except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon" and "Harpie's Brother"). ● 2+ Double the original ATK and DEF of this card. ● 3+ Once per turn, you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
